title: 有问题！！有问题！！求解求解！！！！客户端错误
author: zoushuzi
txt_content:

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: ArrayIndexOutOfBounds，mod装多了不适合拿来联机。。。

replies.author: sjjklh
replies.txt_content: 你确定服务器也有工业 BC 高级红石等这一大堆MOD么……
